channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Reminder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Reminder

item.title: CVE-2022-39876|2024-08-03T12:07:42.890Z -- samsung%20mobile -- reminder
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log in PushRegIdUpdateClient of SReminder prior to 8.2.01.13 allows attacker to access device IMEI.

item.title: CVE-2022-23433|2024-08-03T03:43:46.026Z -- samsung%20mobile -- reminder
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Reminder prior to versions 12.3.01.3000 in Android S(12), 12.2.05.6000 in Android R(11) and 11.6.08.6000 in Andoid Q(10) allows attackers to register reminders or execute exporeted activities remotely.

item.title: CVE-2022-22285|2024-08-03T03:07:50.439Z -- samsung%20mobile -- reminder
item.description: A vulnerability using PendingIntent in Reminder prior to version 12.2.05.0 in Android R(11.0) and 12.3.02.1000 in Android S(12.0) allows attackers to execute privileged action by hijacking and modifying the intent.
